channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: More fly tipping on Pellerin Rd, 28th September
item.description:
Looks like cupboards that some kind person has just dumped. Wtf is wrong with people?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pellerin Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Repeated dog fouling in the footway going on for almost a year now, 28th September
item.description:
Repeated dog fouling which makes the footway barely usable. Unusable for families with young children. Health and safety hazard. Please arrange this to be cleaned as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sterling Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Repeated fouling, 28th September

item.title: Chronic fly tipping on Leila Parnell Place, 28th September
item.description:
The fly tipped rubbish in these photos has been untouched for several months, new items are added every week and it’s now starting to smell badly. It’s causing an environmental health hazard, attracting large rodents as well as being a fire hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leila Parnell Place, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown hedge, 28th September
item.description:
This residential hedge has been allowed to grow so far outside of the property boundary that it now takes up over 30% of the pavement and obstructs wheelchairs and pedestrians alike. The issue is compounded by a tree being outside the house too.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dunlace Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cones to prevent the public to park, 28th September
item.description:
Dear Sir, Madam I am writing to report that door staff at Les Ambassadors Casino are regularly placing cones on the public road to block parking spaces and prevent members of the public from parking there. This appears to be an improper use of the public street for private purposes. Please investigate and take any necessary action. A photo is attached for your reference. Yours faithfully, A concerned resident

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Hamilton Place, Belgravia, London
Report on FixMyStreet
